creator: pascalc@gmail.com

comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:56.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/56.0 ID:20170727100240 CSet: e5693cea1ec944ca077c7a46c5f127c828a90f1b

In today's  build, the Web Developer menu is empty, the only devtool available is View Source, the shortcut key to activate the devtools is not doing anything.

This was seen and reported by multiple people, mostly on Linux but also Windows.
comments.author: pascalc@gmail.com

comments.text: I imagine it comes from bug 1369801.
comments.author: poirot.alex@gmail.com

comments.text: *** Bug 1384968 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
comments.author: jaws@mozilla.com

comments.text: This fixed itself for me after a restart, but shouldn't have been broken in the first place.
comments.author: jaws@mozilla.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Jared Wein [:jaws] (please needinfo? me) from comment #3)
> This fixed itself for me after a restart, but shouldn't have been broken in
> the first place.

I can confirm the problem and that a restart solved for me too.
comments.author: nukeador@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Thanks for the reports.

Unfortunately, automation doesn't cover profile/app-update issues... nor, is it easy to manually test that.

Now, if there is any breakage that occur even after a restart, please drop a word.
It looks like for most people, it works fine after a restart.
comments.author: poirot.alex@gmail.com

comments.text: This has been fixed by the backout of bug 1369801, new nightlies have been requested.
comments.author: aryx.bugmail@gmx-topmail.de

comments.text:
When trying to open the developer tools, by any means (shortcut key, right-click "inspect element" or selecting from Tools > Webdeveloper). The developer tools do not open (nothing happens).

This started to happen this morning:
Version: 62.0a1 (2018-06-08) (64-bit)
comments.author: mattgale.web@gmail.com

comments.text:
(In reply to Matt Gale from comment #7)
> When trying to open the developer tools, by any means (shortcut key,
> right-click "inspect element" or selecting from Tools > Webdeveloper). The
> developer tools do not open (nothing happens).
> 
> This started to happen this morning:
> Version: 62.0a1 (2018-06-08) (64-bit)

Hi Matt, please check https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1467760
comments.author: pascalc@gmail.com

comments.text:
This is probably the same problem as the one fixed in bug 1467679.
Will go away as soon as this bug lands and a new nightly is built.
In the meantime, you can set pref devtools.toolbox.host (in about:config) to right, instead of side.
comments.author: pbrosset@mozilla.com

comments.text: This is solved now, thanks for the quick response.
comments.author: mattgale.web@gmail.com
